tooltip.biomsofinfinity.shadow_heart: Use on a Shadow Altar within the Shadow Isles to summon the Shadow King.
tooltip.biomsofinfinity.crystalite_sword: Marks foes with radiant light on hit.
message.biomsofinfinity.shadow_altar.nee: The altar remains dormant without a Shadow Heart.
message.biomsofinfinity.shadow_altar.wro: The altar rejects your offering outside the Shadow Isles.
message.biomsofinfinity.shadow_altar.on_: The altar needs %s more seconds to recover.
message.biomsofinfinity.shadow_altar.spa: The shadows stir as the king awakens.
message.biomsofinfinity.boss.disabled: Boss summoning is disabled by configuration.
advancements.biomsofinfinity.root.title: Breaching Infinity
advancements.biomsofinfinity.root.descri: Carry a glowshroom spore from the new End wilds.
advancements.biomsofinfinity.luminous.de: Craft a luminous crystal at the Infusion Table.
advancements.biomsofinfinity.altar.title: Keys to the Shadow Isles
advancements.biomsofinfinity.altar.descr: Claim a Shadow Heart for the ancient altar.
advancements.biomsofinfinity.shadow_king: Defeat the Shadow King and reclaim his crown.
